snippet: Iowa’s Third District race between two veteran incumbents is one of the most closely watched in the country, and perhaps no one is watching more closely than Speaker John A. Boehner.
abstract: Reps Leonard L Boswell and Tom Latham of Iowa are mounting one of the most closely watched Congressional races of the election season, forced into competition after the state lost a house seat in the 2010 census; Latham has enjoyed a significant fundraising advantage, largely due to the close support of Speaker John A Boehner (Series: In Full Swing).
lead_paragraph: Iowa’s Third District race between two veteran incumbents is one of the most closely watched in the country, and perhaps no one is watching more closely than Speaker John A. Boehner.

headline.seo: Iowa House Battle Draws Speakers Boehner and Pelosi
headline.main: Iowa House Battle Draws Speakers Present and Past
headline.print_headline: Iowa House Battle Draws Speakers Present and Past
